question: What is the name of the writer who wrote the famous novels such as "The Beautyful Ones Are Not Yet Born" and "Two Thousand Seasons"?
explanation: Ayi Kwei Armah is a Ghanaian writer best known for his novels including The Beautyful Ones Are Not Yet Born (1968), Two Thousand Seasons (1973) and The Healers (1979). He is also an essayist, as well as having written poetry, short stories, and books for children.
